channel.title: Cindy Cao's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Cindy Cao's Portfolio

item.title: [ #Project 1 ] UE5 Animation - Harvest Day
item.description: This project is a 3D animated short film made in Unreal Engine 5. The film is about the digital labor that humans are forced to engage in today and the information cocoon that binds us.

item.title: [ #Project 2 ] Unity VR - The Peach Blossom Spring - Chinese brush painting effect
item.description: The VR experience focuses on Climate Emergency. The first scene shows a utopian scene from a long time ago, the second scene shows the current Climate Emergency facing humanity (inspired by the Chongqing wildfire in 2022), and the third scene shows a cyberspace, where the player can make a commitment. There was a time when meadow, grove, and stream, The earth, and every common sight, To me did seem Apparelled in celestial light, The glory and the freshness of a dream.

item.title: [ #Project 3 ] Hercraft - Creative Short Film
item.description: This movie is a Minecraft fanfic. To make the movie, we shot all the footage first, then we built each scene at a 1:1 scale in Cinema 4D and put Steve and the other characters in it. We did 3D animation and rendering in Cinema 4D, then composed in After Effects. Finally, the finished film was color graded in DaVinci Resolve. Shooting Script Props The girl’s diamond armor tile is shown below, including helmet, chestplate, shoulder armors, leggings, etc.

item.description: AE character animation, with the scene built in C4D.

item.title: [ #Misc ]Shader Graph Effect Works
item.description: Followed the tutorials of bilibili’s ÊµÆÁîüËã•Ê¢¶Jason, I got started with HDRP and Shader Graph This flame is an outer flame, inner flame, flame core, halo, fire sparks, and smoke, made from sequence images Iron flower. Particle collision was added so that there is a fire sparks flying effect on the ground; added point lights to particles; particles stretch with speed A meteor/fireball summoning spell. Using Sub Emitters, this feature can also be used for fireworks and the like!

item.title: [ #Misc ] Delicacies VR: Demo Showcase Video
item.description: The demo video of the Delicacies VR project. Modeling done in C4D, 3D scene built in Unity, and finally implemented on a DPVR all-in-one VR device.

item.description: Modeling, skinning and animation by me, with reference to concept artwork. Mental Ray was used for rendering. Music: Venice Rooftops from Assassin’s Creed 2
